title: JAM 2021: Art + Science
short_description: Are you a college or university student, eager to learn from staff who work to generate funding that supports all museum programs and operations?
header_description: Discover the ways in which art and science intersect in the museum.
list_description: Are you a college or university student, curious about the ways art and science intersect in the museum?
description:
Featured speakers:

Sam Ramos, Associate Director, Innovation and Creativity
Sarah Gordon, Conservation Technician, Textiles
Kristin MacDonough, Assistant Conservator, Time-based Media

This program is meant for college and university students who want to learn about careers in the museum field from working professionals. Learn more about JAM 2021.
buy_button_caption: This free event is for college and university students only; registration required
